position.marginalia_text: Singuli tituli, totidem discursus ingenioso. Tanta hîc Copia, et Varietas selectorum Discursuum.

marginalia.translation: Just as many discourses Here there is a great abundance and variety of select discourses.

position.marginalia_text: Mihi quasi octauus liber Domenici. Satis exempli causa: si satis promptè.

marginalia.translation: For me this work is almost the eighth book of Domenichi. For example, it is enough, if it is ready enough.

position.marginalia_text: Accipere iniuria[m], et dare gratias; aulicum est.

marginalia.translation: It is princely to receive injury and give thanks.

position.marginalia_text: Satis, si solidè: et ad unguem.

marginalia.translation: It is enough if it is firmly known and by heart.

position.marginalia_text: Qui suus est, facilè fit alterius: et in quemuis est alium conuertibilis: pra[e]sertim vnius generis vnum Optimum. Qui dexterrimus est Proficiendi
modus, et efficacissimus. Quomodò Centaurus in suu[m] est equum conuersus, perita assuetudine.

marginalia.translation: He who is his own can easily become another's, and he is changeable into any other thing, especially a single great man

position.marginalia_text: Vir serius sola curat solida: ca[e]tera obitèr percurrens, relinquit ociosis.

marginalia.translation: A serious man cares about solid things, and to idle men he leaves those other things which he passes over quickly.
